summary.subject: Call for Papers - Special Issue on Conceptual and Technical Engineering of Blockchain-based Information Systems
summary.specialIssueDescription: This special issue aims to advance the state of Blockchain-based Information Systems (BISs) and their engineering by addressing conceptual and technical challenges.

conceptual: Models, methods, and tools for the design of BISs
Challenges related to the design of BISs
Empirical material for assessing approaches to the design of BISs
Field experience in the design of BISs
Innovation and re-engineering using Blockchain Technology
Blockchain-enabled business processes for specific industries (e.g. Banking and Finance, Supply Chain, Retail, Government)
technical: Blockchain data management including sharing and provenance
Data privacy and confidentiality on the blockchain
Cross-chain, interoperable and bridge solutions for BISs
Analysis techniques of blockchain data and BISs
Data auditing and monitoring on blockchain

submissionInfo.peerReviewProcess: All papers will be peer-reviewed following a regular reviewing procedure.
